arts.ttl: Shrewsbury Town keeper Toby Savin makes loan switch
arts.sum: Speaking ahead of Town's game against Huddersfield, head coach Gareth Ainsworth said: "We have loaned Toby Savin out to Barnet for a month, they are top of the National League - I think it is a fantastic move for him. He has now joined the Bees, who are top of the National League, on a month-long loan and he went straight into the starting XI for their clash against second-placed York City.

arts.ttl: Huddersfield see off Shrewsbury with late Josh Koroma strike
arts.sum: The win keeps Town in the League One play-off places.

arts.ttl: Tuesday's League One predictions including Shrewsbury Town vs. Huddersfield Town
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's League One fixtures, including Shrewsbury Town vs. Huddersfield Town.

arts.ttl: Duo to prove fitness in Shrewsbury Town training ahead of Huddersfield clash
arts.sum: Lloyd came off at half-time during Salop's clash with Reading last week due to a hamstring injury and was ruled out of their 3-2 defeat against Bolton at the Croud Meadow on Saturday. But Shrews' head coach Gareth Ainsworth said the duo were due to train on the grass with their team-mates on Monday.

arts.ttl: Gareth Ainsworth reveals Steven Schumacher's Shrewsbury Town survival prediction
arts.sum: Speaking ahead of the game against Huddersfield, Ainsworth revealed what the Bolton boss said about his Town team's League One fate this campaign. Town were on the receiving end of a superb comeback from Schumacher's Bolton side as they scored three goals in 20 second-half minutes to lead 3-1.

arts.ttl: Preview: Shrewsbury Town vs. Huddersfield Town - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's League One clash between Shrewsbury Town and Huddersfield Town, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
